entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of the characters who had a bad experience with dementors. He says that they 'sort of freeze your insides' and that his dad came back all weak and shaking after visiting Azkaban.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as one of the characters who had a bad experience with dementors. He says that they 'suck the happiness out of a place' and that most prisoners go mad in Azkaban.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the characters who had a bad experience with dementors. He asks George if he passed out after facing dementors and later helps himself to sausages and fried tomatoes.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as one of the characters who had a bad experience with dementors. He is also mentioned as the opponent in Harry's Quidditch match.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are mentioned as creatures that 'suck the happiness out of a place' and cause people to go mad. They are also described as things that 'sort of freeze your insides'.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: Azkaban is mentioned as a prison where Harry's dad had to go and was affected by dementors.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as the team that Harry is on in Quidditch.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: Slytherin is mentioned as the opponent of Gryffindor in Quidditch.

relationships.description: Fred had a bad experience with dementors.
George had a bad experience with dementors.
Harry had a bad experience with dementors.
Malfoy had a bad experience with dementors.
Harry's dad visited Azkaban and was affected by dementors.
Fred faced Malfoy in a Quidditch match.
Harry is a member of the Gryffindor team.
